WRITING.TEXT: This happened to me too. Looking through your post history you look super pretty. They are just mean for no reason. The imgur community is horrible so don #8217;t let it get to you.
I #8217;m really glad you #8217;re feeling better! And thank you x3
You definitely should. You look amazing
This is adorable. Congratulations on being yourself!
You look really good! What did you do to lose weight? I have been trying for a long time
Have you made friends through this sub? I #8217;m finding it pretty hard to

WRITING.TITLE: Alternatives?
WRITING.TEXT: I never really talk to anyone about this stuff and up until posting this I usually just bottle up this part of myself. I used to cut myself all the time and it became the main way I handled any amount of stress or depression I felt. I haven #8217;t done it in a long time but at the same time I still think like how I used to when I did. sometimes I just start freaking out not wanting to feel any negative feelings or thoughts and instantly think about how I used to handle it. I #8217;ve heard of the whole rubber band thing but does anyone have any other alternatives that might work? I #8217;ve never posted on here or anywhere about this kind of stuff so I don #8217;t know if I #8217;m doing it right but thanks to anyone who takes the time to reply.
